sub_title: Senior People & Process Specialist at BESTSELLER
summary: I am a Senior People & Process Specialist with 6 year of HR experience. In my current role I focus on optimizing and integrating HR processes and policies, as well as lead HR projects. Good interpersonal skills enable me to communicate effectively over different levels. I possess well developed attention to detail, critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

profile_positions.description:
● 	Review, optimize and integrate HR processes and policies across different countries (the Netherlands, Denmark and Poland)
● 	Recognize and implement operational HR related improvements
● 	Manage and support People Specialists in optimizing HR processes
● 	Super user of all HR systems
● 	Lead implementation of new global HR System – SAP SuccessFactors
● 	Develop and co-deliver key process trainings across all organizational levels
● 	Expert in HR part of payroll system
● 	Administrate and coordinate monthly payroll
● 	Take the lead in the yearly salary review process
● 	Review benefits and execute changes
● 	Optimize employee self-service dashboards and HR reports
● 	Lead the GDPR audit and HIGG assessment
● 	Support and advise Junior People Specialist in daily tasks
profile_positions.title: Senior Process & People Specialist

profile_positions.description:
● 	First point of contact for employees
● 	Responsible for general HR administration
● 	Coordinate new hire and onboarding process, as well facilitate introduction sessions
● 	Coordinator relocation for new hires
● 	Administrate and coordinate monthly payroll
● 	Be super user of all HR systems, as well as manage and update all systems
● 	Assist in coordinating training sessions and courses
● 	Support preparation of HR analyses/reporting
profile_positions.title: People Specialist

profile_positions.location: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
● Recruitment and selection
- Advertising, interviews, selection, appointment preparation, Candidate, liaison, etc.
● Fortnightly and Monthly Payroll
- Process overtime, deductions, remuneration, benefits, terminations, etc. on Pastel Payroll for 130 monthly employees. Process fortnightly wages for 100 employees. Generate salary reports. Load salaries on online banking. Generate payslips. PAYE, UIF, SDL, EMP501 and IRP5 submissions. Load monthly payments to third parties. 
● Training
- Arranging and implementing training interventions. Skills Development Facilitator. Compiling WSP/ATR for submission at SETA’s. Compile training budget on yearly basis.
● Employee administration
- Manage employees leave. Generate and maintain employment contracts. Update employee information. Manage employee benefits. Facilitate termination of employment.
● Performance management
- Processing, writing, implementing and reporting of performance appraisals and ratings.
● Industrial Relation
- Manage industrial and employee relations. Represent company at the CCMA. Arrange and attend disciplinary hearings. Work with bargaining councils and unions to assure compliance with regulations. Analysing and evaluating of incidents (COIDA). Submitting yearly return of earning on COIDA system. Develop and improve policies and procedures.
● BBBEE and Employment Equity
- Compiling documents with agents yearly
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Officer

profile_positions.description:
● Recruitment and selection
- Administration, coordinate interview process, draw up documentation, coordinate on-boarding programm
● Employee administration & well being
-Generate, facilitate signage and file employment contracts, update employee information, manage leave and employee benefits, handle UIF administration
● Performance management
-Manage review schedule, generate and facilitate signage of contracts and addendums, facilitate grievance, disciplinary procedures and termination of employment
● Monthly payroll
- Manage company, employee information and benefit information, process remuneration, expense claims, overtime and leave, generate payroll reports, load salaries on online banking, send UIF and EMP201 reports, generate payslips, solve any payroll enquiries, assist auditors with employee information and distribute IRP5 certificates to employees
● Training & Development
- Manage and submit WSP and ATP, coordinate company team buildings and annual retreat
● Development & maintenance of HR policies & procedures
- Develop employee manual, implement processes as per employee manual, review and improve policies and procedures, ensure compliance with employee and labour legislation, co-ordinate bi-annual election of ERC
● Finance & Year-end assistance
- Load beneficiaries and payments on Pastel and bank account, generate and send customer invoices, load supplier invoices on Pastel, allocate transactions on Pastel, resolve finance enquiries
profile_positions.title: HR and Finance Administrator
